Podcasts.name: Podcasts
Podcasts.descriptiveText:
EX: for this iTunes link https://podcasts.apple.com/podcast/id1448327383 the ID would be 1448327383.
#	This feed ID also provides subscription options for Overcast and Castro.

Google.descriptiveText:

#	The ID would be aHR0cHM6Ly90aGVsaW5lcnByb2plY3QuY29tL2luZGV4LnhtbA==
